title: TUTORIAL Miniature chocolate cake Prague with polymer clay | PDF + video
description: The price includes a tutorial on creating a miniature chocolate cake Prague with polymer clay for dollhouses at a scale of 1:12. This tutorial is a PDF file with a description of the necessary materials, a link to the video, and a full text guide. For your convenience, the video is uploaded to YT and has subtitles in English. An active link to the video is included in the PDF file and also provided as a QR code. Please note that the video does not have voice acting! This tutâ€¦
